structure_sections.description: "hainlere inat daha fazla çalışacağız..." - The program opens with a statement about resilience against enemies, followed by the presenter introducing the news segment from the ATV News Center.

"milletçe Başkentte savunma sanayimizin gözbebeği..." - The main news content begins with a report on a terrorist attack targeting TUSAŞ, detailing the impact on the victims and their families, including personal stories of the deceased.
"Şehit Zahide güçlü Gözya..." - The program concludes with remarks related to the victims and a somber reflection on the events covered, signaling the end of the news segment.
